name: simplified_ecommerce_api_fromscratch
description: a simple e-commerce made from zero to deploy
author: Mikhael Dantas

scripts.docker:tests-provider: docker run --rm -it -v $(pwd):/app -w /app --network e_commerce_simplified_layer-a --env-file .env.test node:18.12 sh -cx "yarn ts-node TestsProvider/index.ts"
scripts.docker:testPrep: docker run --rm -it -v $(pwd):/app -w /app --network e_commerce_simplified_layer-a --env-file .env.test node:18.12 sh -cx "yarn jest --colors __testsPrep__"
scripts.docker:testAuto: docker run --rm -it -v $(pwd):/app -w /app --network e_commerce_simplified_layer-a --env-file .env.test node:18.12 sh -cx "yarn jest --colors __tests__/autoGenerated"
scripts.docker:testAutoUnit: docker run --rm -it -v $(pwd):/app -w /app --network e_commerce_simplified_layer-a --env-file .env.test  -e UNIT=1 node:18.12 sh -cx "yarn jest --colors __tests__/autoGenerated/unit"
scripts.docker:test: docker run --rm -it -v $(pwd):/app -w /app --network e_commerce_simplified_layer-a --env-file .env.test node:18.12 sh -cx "yarn jest --colors"
